channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Third member of LockBit ransomware gang has been arrested
item.description: LockBit is believed tobe responsible for at least $500 million in ransom payments alone. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only...

item.title: Why Can’t You Switch Seats in an Empty Airplane?
item.description: Yes, the weight distribution on an aircraft really does affect how well it flies. Our physics guy explains.

item.title: Sam Altman disputes Marc Andreessen’s description of AI meetings with Biden administration
item.description: Sam Altman dismissed what he called a "conspiracy theory" from a16z co-founder Marc Andreessen. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal u...

item.title: This Tropical Virus Is Spreading Out of the Amazon to the US and Europe
item.description: Oropouche virus has posed little threat outside South America in the past, but land-use change, the climate crisis, and international travel all appea...

item.title: After causing outrage on the first day of Y Combinator, AI code editor PearAI lands $1M seed
item.description: On the first day of Y Combinator the founders of PearAI got “cancelled." They used the hate to launch a new product, raise $1 million. © 2024 TechCrun...

item.title: EV startup Canoo places remaining employees on a ‘mandatory unpaid break’
item.description: Struggling electric van startup Canoo has placed its remaining employees on what it’s calling a “mandatory unpaid break” through at least the end of t...

item.title: 2024 Was the Year the Bottom Fell Out of the Games Industry
item.description: From layoffs to the return of Gamergate, video games—and the people who make and play them—had a rough year.

item.title: I Used AI to Do All of My Holiday Shopping
item.description: Chatbots aren't very good at picking gifts, but that didn't stop me from burning the planet in a quest for the perfect baking equipment.

item.title: Feds clear the way for robotaxis without steering wheels and pedals
item.description: The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) on Friday proposed a new national framework that could make it easier for companies to depl...

item.title: OpenAI Upgrades Its Smartest AI Model With Improved Reasoning Skills
item.description: A day after Google announced its first model capable of reasoning over problems, OpenAI has upped the stakes with an improved version of its own.
